犲字的基本解释

犲
chái
古同“豺”。

犲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chái］
［《廣韻》士皆切，平皆，崇。］
亦作“犲1”。
兽名。犬科，形似狼而小，性凶猛，常成群围攻牛、羊等家畜。俗名豺狗。

犲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　犲； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页706第14
【集韻】沐皆切，音儕。【玉篇】犲狼也。本作豺。詳豸部豺字註。又山名。【山海經】犲山，多堪㐨之魚。

犲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
犲字的起名意思

暂无。

E
Basic explanation of words
E
chái
Ancient with "Jackal".
E
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chái］
["Guangyun" scholars are all cut, flat, and chong. ]
Also known as "E1".
Animal name. Canidae, small in appearance like a wolf, and ferocious in nature, often besieging cattle, sheep and other domestic animals in groups. The common name is jackal.
E
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　犲; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 706 14
[Ji Yun] Mu are all cut, with different sounds. [Jade articles] The wolf is also. This is a jackal. Detailed notes on the word 豸部豺. Also the name of the mountain. [Shan Hai Jing] Can mountain, more than a fish worthy of 㐨.
